forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies this afternoon. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area early, then partly cloudy during the afternoon. High 62F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.
